author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1109 Modified service wrapper to provide a way to stop a service without resorting to CTRL-C. Once the service is launched it will expect either 'q' to quiesce the service and stop, or 's' to stop the service hard.

author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1106 Initial @Null and @NotNull validation contraint tests along with other entity classes for future tests to be added.

author: bdaniel
msg: TUSCANY-3121 binding.atom should leverage introspection when setting up call to mediator

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1109 Added new undeploy method that allows for specifying two flavors of stopping a service: quiesce and stop or hard stop.
